t: When*p the Lord*s turned again the captivity of Zion, we were like them that dream.
Then*p was our mouth filled with laughter, and our tongue with singing: then said they among the heathen, The Lord*s hath done great things for them.
The*p Lord*s hath done great things for us; whereof we are glad.
Turn*p again our captivity, O Lord,*s as the streams in the south.
They*p that sow in tears shall reap in joy.
He*p that goeth forth and weepeth, bearing precious seed, shall doubtless come again with rejoicing, bringing his sheaves with him.
